DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to determine the safety and efficacy of Zalutumumab alone or in combination with Irinotecan for the treatment of patients with Colorectal Cancer
DOC.brief_title: Zalutumumab With or Without Irinotecan Chemotherapy in Cetuximab-Refractory Colorectal Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1. Males and Females age â‰¥ 18 years 2. Confirmed diagnosis of CRC 3. Documented disease progression 4. Failure and/or intolerance to standard chemotherapy 1. Prior treatment with antiEGFR antibodies other than cetuximab 2. Expected survival < 3 months 3. Clinical significant cardiac disease and/or uncontrolled medical conditions
